mapper.select: select * from notice where NOTICE_CATEGORY = 'main' order by notice_id desc
select * from notice where NOT NOTICE_CATEGORY = 'main' order by notice_id desc
select count(*) from notice where NOT NOTICE_CATEGORY = 'main'
select NOTICE_ID, NOTICE_TITTLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, to_char(NOTICE_CREATED, 'YYYY/MM/DD') NOTICE_CREATED, USERID, NOTICE_CATEGORY, NOTICE_HITS from notice where NOTICE_ID = #{noticeID}
select max(notice_id) from notice where notice_id in (select max(notice_id) from question where #{noticeID} > notice_id and NOTICE_CATEGORY = #{category}) order by notice_id desc
mapper.update: update notice set NOTICE_TITTLE = #{notice_tittle}, NOTICE_CONTENT = #{notice_content} where NOTICE_ID = #{notice_id}
update notice set NOTICE_HITS = #{noticeHite} where NOTICE_ID = #{noticeID}
mapper.insert: insert into notice (NOTICE_ID, NOTICE_TITTLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, NOTICE_CREATED, NOTICE_HITS, NOTICE_CATEGORY, USERID) values (NOTICE_NOTICE_ID_SEQ.nextval, #{notice_tittle}, #{notice_content}, sysdate, 0, #{notice_category}, #{userid})
